description: This C# source file defines a service (`ReportPdfService`) that generates a simple PDF report summarizing AI trends for mechanical engineering. It includes an interface (`IReportPdfService`), the implementation class, and an internal helper class (`SimplePdfBuilder`) that constructs a minimal PDF document with basic text content, using only built-in fonts and simple layout.

classes.name: ReportPdfService
classes.description: Implements a PDF report generator for trends, producing a minimal PDF with headings and trend details.

classes.name: SimplePdfBuilder
classes.description: Internal class responsible for constructing a minimal, single-page PDF document with text content using basic PDF primitives and the Helvetica font.

methods.name: GeneratePdf
methods.description: Creates a simple PDF document containing trend data, including titles, summaries, sources, and dates, formatted as plain text.

methods.name: BuildSinglePage
methods.description: Builds a single-page PDF with provided text lines, writing low-level PDF objects and content streams.
